content.detailedDescription:
It was scary
i think i have ptsd because of it. i can't remember what happened at all. we were just in the woods and it was there.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: This is the third (3rd) time this was seen. but his time there were several obejects and the same thing the night before. at first looking up at the objects they seems to move back and forth in a straight line. looking throung binoculars the obects jerked, fade in and out and moved iradic. looking at he what appeared to be the farthest object below it appeared 2 dimmer objects and in the area between the 3 could be seen a faint triangle object. i could not tell how far away these were no reference at night. several large jet aircraft came into the area above and seemed to pay no mind to the ufo's but the jet aircrat came baack from a different direction still seeming to not pay attention to the ufo's. i was in my yard getting out of my car when i looked up at the stars and saw these objests. after viewing thes objects for i while i felt afraid. i came out side through the night looking up and the objects still there. i noticed that around where we live seems very quiet and eerie, something is really wrong here. my wife also has seen these objects and perhaps they will be back tonight. i think they are watching us for some reason if they do how up i will repot this again but it is cloudy now and may remain so all night. there is an airport nearby but nothing as large as the jets that passed over could land or take off there reminds me of living on an airbase when we were kids as the airplays sounded like military jets. i got up around 3am to see if the objects were still there they were i watched for a while and retired for the rest of the night maybe tonight i can see them again. i wonder if anyone else around my area has seen these? i also wonder if they are remote controled or piloted by inteligent beings?
content.summary: Star like blurry red green and blue lights around center objects moved in relation to pulsed lights

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike down a street that i see about everyday i heard a big blastthat sounded like a jet broke the sound barrior. i looked into the sky and saw a red and black long skinny thing. atfirst i didn't know what it was because had no wings. as i watched it not move for about three minutes then in a blink of an eye i went out of sight then two where it was. it turned where it was tall flew down to the heighth of these big tele phone poles and sit there for 20 minutes. it was as long of two school busses then it shot back up out of sight.During the sighting the hair on my arms stuck up.
content.summary: Long and skinny, red and black, very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Dogs woke me up at three a.M.  looking out back door looking up small hill at dogs barking .Seen glowing object zig-zaging thu the trees coming down the hill .  zig ziging about two feet off ground  came to fence rose up over fence back down. zig zaging to within 25 feet stoped. my dad came from behind me stood looking at this . object zig zags back up hill up over fence back down  zig zaging up though trees out of site.   whole time dogs in a fenced in dog lot barked unstoped. the object moved slowly.Took about 12 min. to go about 100 yards out of site.We talked about this sighting till daylight went up the hill to top with dogs was a opening where loggers  once worked years ago. the dogs ran around barking in this clearing/  buy we saw nothing.I was 14 at the time  my dad never talked about this much he passed away last year. at the time we thought this was a probe of some kind an a bigger ship was in the clearing  i guess ill never know but we saw a  small glowing object   that night has any one else seen a object like this.                                                                            there was no sound coming from the object just loud barking
content.summary: About 2'-6"  wide 2 foot tall  .Disc shaped .   glowing  .   no lines or letters

content.detailedDescription:
I just finished dinner with a friend , he left for home , soi went out to my  parents backyard to lay back in a lounge chair. it was warm that night for november,.As i was lying there,i just kept staring in one spot , then i noticed the strangest thing.A ripple
the spot i was looking at started to move over me. this object made no noise ,and as it was above me ,  i knew wht it was,boomarang shape ,about 50 yards wide,as wide as my parents back yard,lights white small lights, the size of the head of a flashlight,all over the object,it was black and blended in with the stars , it must of have been 150 -200ft , right on top of me.
i remeber looking up , thinking,what next? then i had a feeling i was beening watched,then i got this peaceful feeling.
then the craft started moving very slover over me & the house ,no noise ,nothing .I must have been in shock,could'nt move,then i bolted
through the house to watch it pass.
i saw nothing.
i know that they look like the crafts ,they're real.
content.summary: Approached me in my parents back yard

content.detailedDescription:
My condo faces the west.  my wife was upstairs, i was downstairs. my wife yelled to me, "look at that!" i looked out the patio door and saw three bright lights to the west.  they were at a 45 degree angle, not very high in the sky, about a mile away.  they were very close and silent.

they were in a triangle formation (one at the top two below). the lights were equal size and brilliance.   i stared at them for a couple of minutes.  

suddenly, all three lights moved south about a quarter mile and stoppoed.  the left bottom light flew west at a tremendous speed parallel to the earth and out of view.

the other two lights stayed in place.

after a minute or two, the third light returned as fast as it left. it stopped in place without a sound.   all three lights move dnorth to their original position.     

the top light flew straight up at an unbeleivable speed until iy became as small as a star and disappeared into space. me and my wife were yelling and screaming in excitement the entire time.

next, the other two lights, one at a time, took off int the same direction as the first and diappeared into space. 

i knew the object was a ufo.  no sonic boom.  

some time later, the news reported the objects as ufo's at the military air show and showed them on tv "once." i waited to record the next news broadcast.  never heard it again. can't find anywhere.
content.summary: Three seperate bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
Decription, draw a triangle on paper  then draw a nother one about an inch beside it, no connect the points from the first to the second one,,draw three circles on the first one inside the triangle near the points.Now draw one on the bottom where you connected the to lower triangle points,. now imagine that flying 50 ft above your head, very quiet, only a whisper, like jetsons ship in the cartoon almost.

story-
i was headed to pick my girl up from work, around 10:30, and out the side of my eye i seen this object floating by, so i looked up and i seen (what i described aboved, it was very low, and i knew it wasnt a plane or helicopter cause planes dont fly that low and both the plane and helicopter are loud, this was whisper quiet,i wasnt thinking bout the digital camera in my car, because it was the first time i had ever seen , a ufo, cause it has to be unidentified, it wasnt a blimp either.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: For detailed info (see below)

1. star gazing

2. bigger than normal plane light.

3. plane

4. slow and steady, then excelleration and disapearance.

5. suprisingingly placid, calm.

6. upon excelleration i lost sight of object.
content.summary: Plane-like light moving steady eastward - then excelleration and disapearance.

content.detailedDescription: Hit by ball lightening 13 years ago . 11/27/08 had fire at business, for the next few months and then some. saw 1 ufo, there was very low flying air planes, stars, satilites in the sky, heleicopter, beeps, static electricity,magnet,rods,lightning,flash bathroon lights on and off,surrond sound,electronic ease dropping,phone tap, computer tap,comcast taped,clouds,silver thing above car,blue siloute
content.summary: Conspiracy theory. fire, insurance, spies, crime, fbi, cia, ins.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok..It was by birthday..And i was summoned to come outside as usual..I was living in another two story apt out here at the time..So i went down the stairs..I thought i was going to see red or white lights streaking across the sky like a shhoting star again  ( i always get those every year for my birthday) but it wasnt this time..It was a big black triangle..It came from the west going east..It had red lights on the bottom..If i had 3 latters and stacked them on my roof..I could have touched the bottom of that very annoying thing..It took about 20 mintues for itt to fly over my porch i was standing on..I just watched it fly off even though it was a stupid gift because i learned as a child that if i didnt accept a present,,,white people and lasrge animals and people made of light will come in my home..They scasred all my half sisters and half brother our entire childhood lives..Any way
about 20 mintues give or take a few..It took that  to fly over me  then it came back about 10 mintues later..This time it came from the north and went west..I never told anyone..But im sure my neighbors have seen things..They follw me all my life..When i lived in macon cort apts  my neigbor had called morehead city police department about a couple of years ago..I found out when people taling outside woke me..I looked out the window and there was 2 police cars and my neirbor mrs obra standing in front of the apt building across from me..I opened the window cause the police was pointing flash lights up on her roof..I heard mrs obra say while pointing to my apt.."it jumped from that roof to mine"  anyway i open my window and asked the police what was going on..The woman said "nothing..She just heard a baby crying"  i said..On the roof..Then closed my window becase she insulted my intelligence..Im going now..Im hungry..It is now 7:50am..Sometimes on my birthday i get a circle made of red and white lights that will come down and let me touch it..It wont hurt you..And sometimes energy streams that look like a long spiders webwill follw me places..Even at home and at school at the college..At first i thought the enenrgy stream was spiders web..But when i stand in the middle of a street or feild that stream is still coming straight down  from the sky next to me..Very beautiful  but also annoying..But i get stuff almost every week now  not just on my birthday..My stepgad saw the large animals only  when he yell or hit me  they showed up..He stop sleeping or coming in the house i was raised in..My ex husband saw them too my ex boyfriends saw black shadows and one of them couldnt sleep in my apt unless he had the lights on and tv on..But dont worry..As long as you dont try to harm me..They will just let you see them but dont touch you..Not scary ok..Just annoying
content.summary: Flew very slowly over me and then again in plain sight..Annoying

content.detailedDescription:
I am an aircraft engineer at raf lyneham and this event took place while working a night shift.
 i was out on the aircraft pan performing an aircraft servicing with some colleagues and i noticed some orange lights in the sky just above the buildings south-west of where i was standing. there were 3 lights at first with another 2 or 3 appearing a few minutes after.I alerted one of my colleagues an we both stood and watched them, trying to apply logic to what they could be. 
 they just seemed to hang in the sky, not moving around at all. the last lights to appear were the first ones to disappear, leaving just the first lights. then the original 3 lights disappeared around 2 or 3 minutes after.
 the objects were slightly smaller than the moon and a similar colour to sodium street lamps but in a location where there are no street lamps and too high.
 i know what aircraft flares look like and these were too large and too long lasting. there were also no helicopters in the area that night. i am a sceptic generally but these objects were like nothing i've seen before and watching them was unnerving to the point where i had a shiver going up my spine. i have since seen a video on youtube, from a local resident, that shows almost identical objects in around the same area, but seemingly at a higher altitude. this video was recorded maybe a year or more earlier.
content.summary: Orange lights near raf lyneham

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the trash out when i noticed a large red light in the sky to the north, i knew it wasn't a star, and i had dreamed of this day at last, the object then ceased its brightness , then telported to the left of its position , i ran inside to get the camera while the object was still there, but sadly my (cyber view) camera is horrible so i couldn't get a photo. the only thing i have is this accuarate photo of where this object was.

you can contact me on my rogue e-mail account

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: 1 ufo teleports 2 times then 5 min later apears

content.detailedDescription: I was on a walk.As i was walking i noticed a light in the sky,i thought it was a star.The next time i looked up it was moving toward me from the northwest.I stood in the street watching it.At first i thought it was the space station.But as it went over i noticed it was two lights very close togather in tandam.They were moving very fast.They were at very high altitiude or possably in space.They traveled from the n.W to the s.E.The hole thing lasted about three min before they traveled out of sight.
content.summary: Two white lights very close together, one following the other at high altitiude.

content.detailedDescription: Just sky watching with binoculars using a wooden stick for steadiness and watched this triangle pass over about 10,000 ft. 3 large dull lights almost transparent looking zoomed over as i watch for 10 sec.Never seen anthing like it, very neat.
content.summary: 3 lights in a dull glow evry large no sound heading south along east coast

content.detailedDescription: Looked out my bedroom widow and saw a triangular arrangement of lights in the northwest sky. watched it for several seconds then it dissapeared when i went to get my dad.
content.summary: Triangular arrangement of lights

content.detailedDescription: i live about 3 miles north west from the nearest town, noted above.  i went outside to let my dog out to do her thing at about 2:58 am.  as i was looking at the horison i saw a large ball of light shoot stright up at high speed to approximately 80 feet.  i thought some idiot had set off a comercial firework and i was expecting an explosion.  instead it just hung moitionless in the air approximately 3/4 mile away, and after a few seconds, the light dimmed and i could see a lighted disk, silvery color, with red, blue, and i believe green light that seem to be on the outer edge of the disk.  i soon realised it was moving away in a south-west direction from me slowly and soon i could only see the glow of the disk.  it then started being blocked by the trees and other obstructions. i went back to bed.  had trouble going to sleep though.
content.summary: Raised from ground fast. stopped then slowly headed south-east from my position.

content.detailedDescription:
Asbury park boardwalk taken photos..Didn't notice anything out of the ordinary. tuesday got home downloaded photos from my camera's memory card and noticed the objects. but even at the time of taken the photo's i didn't notice any strange objects or hear any strange type of sounds.
 i thought they where airplanes until i enhanced the photo.
content.summary: Didn't see objects until i downloaded photos.

content.detailedDescription: Ive seen ufos about 4 different times now, they were v shape,i have been visited by aliens since i was 5 years old,they told me this,i wake up in the mornings with black eyes, bloody lip,puncture wounds in both ears with blood coming out,i have several implants in both ears,this has been happening for years and is happening more and more,i also have scares that are v shaped and triangle shaped that i keep waking up with,it goes on and on,i have dreams almost every night about aliens,this has been happening my whole life,it happens so much that i keep a journal,there is also like a plasma ball effect going on in my room every night,i think that is how they have 24 hour access to me,all these strange little things keep happening to me,i use to think that i was crazy,but now i know that it is the aliens.
content.summary: I'm being visited by aliens almost every night now.

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to submit this after reading a report submitted on the 6th in about a sighting in oregon.

on the morning of june 5, i was filling up at a gas station just north of the wa/or border.  i looked up and a bright flash caught my eye.  it was a gray orb that flashed a bright, white light in groups of 3 (spaced about 1/8 second apart then 1 second between groups).  it was making movements no plane could make (very fast n/e/s/w movements).  i told several people to look at it, including my wife.  3 of us watched for several minutes then it abruptly disappeared.  no one ventured an explanation although we all concluded it was most certainly not an airplane.

my best guess is that it was a mylar balloon although there are several reasons why i don't think this is the case: the flashing came in 3s very evenly spaced apart, it didn't move like a balloon, (its moves seemed deliberate - backtracking at points) and the size to speed ratio seemed off (too fast and high to be as big as it was).

i didn't have my camera but, to be honest, it wouldn't have looked like much if i did snap a photo.

i wouldn't submit this if i did not see the previous report describing exactly what i saw, the same day, near the place i saw it.
content.summary: Gray orb flashing brightly

content.detailedDescription:
I am white with a navajo wife living on the navajo reservation. for many years i have heard many stories about satan's butte - all stories revolve around ufo's and snakes. while i believe in the likelihood of ufo's - i never really believed in something this close to our home. 

a week ago i was outside at 9:46pm and looked toward satan's butte and saw a spaceship hovering above the butte. (the butte is about three miles away.)i ran into the house and grabbed my sister-in-laws camera and my binoculars. i could not get a clear picture but watched the ufo cylindrical sphere with red blinking lights descend into the butte. 

two days later the even repeated - i yelled to my unbelieving wife but by the time she got outside it had already descended. 

last friday we went to flagstaff and i bought a "good" camera. last night at 10:46pm we both witnessed the ufo - i took pictures and now have a witness and pictures! my wife admits she thought i was seeing things but i took pictures and she watched through the binoculars. 

the navajo are a reticent people but talk amongst themselves - they have seen this many times over the years.
content.summary: Third time this object has descended in satan's butte this week

content.detailedDescription:
It was beautiful winter day and there was not a single cloude in the sky.I was on my balcony with my mother,actually she was on the balcony and i was standing at the balcony door and we were talking about something.At one point i've noticed something very bright,glowing in the sky,so i went out to the balcony to see what it was.I knew it wasn't the sun because i could see the sun setting far away from that object,and this object was just sitting still in silence above the sea,in front of the mountain,it didn't move at all.Then it blinked two or three times and it disappeared.Before it disappeared,when it blinked i couldn't see any object like it was dematerialized (if that's the right word).Actually,at one point i went back to my apartment to look at the clock,for some reason i wanted to know the exact time of this event.By the time i came back,the object was gone.
i think my first reaction was curiosity,i kept my eyes on that object,i even tried not to blink.I knew i'm witnessing something extraordinary,but i also think my curiosity was mixing with caution,because i didn't know what to expect and in the same time i was calm.It was a mixture of all those feelings.I was just so sorry that i didn't have a camera,but since that day i try to always have my camera with me.
content.summary: A large very bright glowing ball

content.detailedDescription: Red star
content.summary: Star like

content.detailedDescription:
The night i saw the objects, i was up late observing the leonid meteor shower. not looking for any sort of unusual flying objects, i had seen earlier meteors with the usual leonid characteristics (bright fireballs, ion trails). soon high clouds began to cover the northern sky where i saw the earlier fireballs. i was in a track and field complex observing the shower, so i lied down on the paved running track to get a better plane of view for later meteors. 

i lied down there for a while, and around 1am the meteors began to pick up in amount. some of the meteors were like regular shooting stars and were faint, but others had bright white colored fireballs. during this peak in meteor activity is when i caught movement out of the corner of my eye at the zenith of the night sky.

at first i thought it was a few meteors, but the "objects" never faded, didn't have ion trails, and were moving too slow. curious at this point, i looked directly at the faint objects and discovered that they were flying in an equilateral triangle formation. my next conclusion were that the "objects" were either landing lights on an aircraft or birds, but there were no blinking lights, distant jet engine noise, or flapping wings. at this point i realized i was looking at genuine ufos.

with my curiosity turned from the leonids, i focused my complete attention to the 3 ufos. as i did i realized that these ufos weren't just points of light, but actual flying objects with depth! i could see that they were bronze colored and appeared to be glowing against the night sky with a light similar to the dying orange sparkle of an incendiary. the objects were circular from my point of view as i was looking at their underside, and had grooves in them similar to a plate or phonograph record. i saw no windows in the objects. i assumed that they were lenticular shaped in profile since i saw no antennae or spikes protruding from them, and how they resembled a plate. 

i continued to track them across the night sky, being sure to remember what groups of stars they moved across and what heading the ufo's were taking. the ufos passed through the zenith of the night sky and flew in between the constellations perseus and auriga. i also noted how the objects were moving almost directly north to south. this movement is very similar to something called a polar orbit, which i found very unusual.

the entire event lasted approximately 2 minutes as the 3 lens-objects flew through the night sky. the objects neither took off at high speed, nor hovered. they maintained a constant velocity throughout the time i saw them. as the objects moved toward the southern horizon, they began to be drowned out by brown light pollution, but before they disappeared the ufos performed one last maneuver.

in the southern sky, while maintaining the same velocity as the others, one of the objects broke from the equilateral triangle formation and flew in a more southeasterly direction. the other two ufo's simultaneously maintained their previous positions in the "triangle" and continued in their southerly trajectory. i also noted that when the object pulled away, it neither pitched nor rolled like a conventional aircraft. shortly after these maneuvers were completed, the light pollution became too much and i lost site of the objects near the horizon.

i felt no "presence" when i saw the ufos, didn't see any beings, or had the perception of lost time. i saw three unusual craft under some form of intelligence, perform maneuvers that are impossible for conventional aircraft at such a low altitude. in my logical opinion, i saw something truly unusual that needs to scientifically explored further.
content.summary: During peak activity of leonid meteor shower, 3 lenticular bronze objects were seen flying in an organized formation.

content.detailedDescription:
This was not a normal light.  in over 50 years, i've never seen any light in the sky this bright.  it is not the moon, reflection off the cloud, or the luxor hotel beam.  any ideas what this was are welcomed, to satisfy my curiosity. 

details:  i was on my cell long distance and went out on my porch when i saw it.  i was astonished and in awe, and told my son what i was seeing and to hold on while i got the camera.  i got back on the phone and put him on speaker while i took the video.  it was hard to stare at directly, but i took the video anyway.  i went back in the house after about 4 or five minutes, plugged my phone back in the wall and when i came back outside, it was gone.

fyi, i witnessed two star-like objects in the june of 1973 over big sur, cali., that stopped and sped away at a great speed.  no one believed me and they all thought i must have been high or crazy in those days.  i've been looking up in the sky ever since.  i even wrote a poem:  "i know i done seem me some stars, that moved and stopped and sped away, and i know earth ain't the only place god put some folks to stay."
content.summary: Extremely bright light - over 5 minutes it remained in the same spot.

content.detailedDescription: On friday the 4th around the time of 8:00 or 8:30 my husband and i was in the backyard watering our plants. while my husband was putting away the water hose i happen to look up to the sky and notice this black metal object in the sky. this thing had fire shooting out and around it. it glided in a horizontal pattern. i told my husband to look at this thing and tell me what he thinks it is. he of course, didn't know what to think. it wasn't too far away that you couldn't tell what you were looking at and it didn't make any noise. this thing didn't have any wings to it. i had mentioned to my husband that maybe it was space debris falling down. he then said that this thing was moveing in a way that didn't look like something falling. it just glided. we felt a little creeped out by this thing. i also noticed it had some sharp points on it. i tried to contact via e-mail our local newspaper to see if they had anyone else reporting this and they never got back to me. i've been watching and reading the newspaper and nothing was reported. i would like to know if anyone else saw what we saw.
content.summary: Black metal object with points to it and flames shooting out from  it

content.detailedDescription: I was at a kansas city royals game on sunday afternoon. around 2pm i just happened to look up in the sky and saw a small white object floating slowly from north to south. it had 4 star like looking objects that were in a diamong form aroung it. one above, one below and one on each side that were moving with it. then about 4 0r 5 minutes later tghe 4 star objects were out in front to the north of the object and 5 to 6 more stars were scattered around it in no apparent order. they all slowly just moved to the north until they were no longer visible from the stadium. i told my wife to look up at it and she saw it as well. i seen other people in the stadium pointing at it as well.  i had sunglasses on which made the star looking objects more visible. when i took them off they werent as easy to view. the main object was easily seen with or without the objects. i was very amazed and had no idea what it could have been. i watched the news and looked on the internet to see if anybody else had seen it and talked about it, but nothing was ever mentioned. my wife jsut said it was "strange" but didnt get as worked up as i did. i told her she was probably one of them. she gave me a dirty look.
content.summary: 1 white round object with 4 stars in a diamond shape surrounding the ufo. stars then moved and 6 more were near.

content.detailedDescription: Friday the 4th of june. my husband and i was watering our plants in the backyard. when we finished, while my husband was putting the water hose away i looked up in the sky and saw this strange object. i couldn't tell what it was. i could see it very clear, but i didn't know what it was. i called my husband and asked him if he knew what this thing was. he looked at it and couldn't tell what this flying thing was. we were a little creeped out about it. this thing was black and it was made of metal. the object had flames shooting out from the bottom and sides of it. this thing didn't make any noise. i also noticed it had some sharp points to it. this object move very slow in a horizontal pattern in a northeast direction. it keeped moving to the point that we lost sight of it in the clouds. i first thought it was space debris falling from the sky. my husband said that it didn't fall from the sky, this thing moved in a way that falling debris wouldn't move. it moved like something was in control of it. i e-mailed the newspaper to see if anyone else made any reports on this object, but never got a response. i checked the newspaper to see if they wrote anything about this thing and nothing was ever mentioned in it. i was wondering if you can look into this and see if anyone else saw this thing or if there's a resonable explaination to what this was.
content.summary: Black metal object with fire around it on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of saturday june 5th our paranormal group decided to do a investigation in a cemetery near richland missouri in pulaski county. it was just the group leader, his wife, and myself that night.   we were having the usual investigation and were at first glance getting a lot of orbs, with a couple of really cool face pictures.  while at the cemetery i saw a shooting star shoot straight down.  the night was clear with some clouds in the distance producing heat lightning.  my friend was using a camera that had an infra red attachment.  he has a better camera then i do that is 10megapixel. we spent about 45 minutes at this place then moved on to the next cemtery down a series of dirt roads.  while there all three of us noticed a constant humming noise at this cemetery. it was not the interstate as when you live by a road there are occasional breaks in the noise.  we finished up the investigation at the second investigation and headed back to the group leader's house. we uploaded our pictures to our respective computers and procedded to go through the evidence right then and there.  about approximately ten minutes into the review of evidence.  i hear "what the hell is that?!?"  coming from the group leader.  i got up and, his wife got up from the computer desk and headed over to his desk and looked at an unusual object hanging in the sky among the trees.  this was unlike anything i had ever seen before. we realized that this photo was taken in the first cemetery.  the picture that was taken in the same spot and in the general same direction before had no such object in it.  it was invisible to us.  while we were in that spot we had to be no more then 25 feet from the object and the group leader speculates that the object was hovering about in the tree tops. observing us.  also noticed in other photographs are humanoid looking faces with two black stripes painted upon their cheeks. it is also worth noting that the group leader and his wife did a previsit to the graveyard about two weeks ago.  when we arrived he commented that their looked to be several dirt patches that were not there previously.  were the aliens investigating us investigating the cemetary? did they follow us to the other cemetary and was that the contant humming we heard?  we may never know the true answer.
content.summary: Ghost hunting and took a picture of a possible ufo.  also heard a loud  constant humming noise at another cemetery

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and looked up and saw a star like object which was high it was traveling too fast to be a plane and had no flashing lights on it , it was a perfect clear night and i could see orion stars and the plough this object traveled between thease two in around 4 seconds , it also looked like it was seriously high , im not sure if it could have been a satalite maybe ? from where i was looking it moved left through the sky 








i couldnt sleep so i did some laundry and went out to hang it on the line



a star but then saw it was moving , then thought it could be a satalite or space station passing over , but this thing was moving fast !! 


moved across the sky from left to right at a realy high speed it took only a few seconds to cover the distance a jumbo jet covers in minutes ! 
this is not the first sighting i have had i had a very close sighting about 10 years ago while with a friend who is a fire fighter so not shocked but i am always critical of what i see as i no there are many things like chinese lanterns , aircraft , satalites , etc in the skys  if it had been moving slower id have passed it as maybe a plane or satalight , but this moved so fast and smooth in a perfect line it had no trails coming from it either
content.summary: Star like object traveling at high speed
